modName: Bow Run Swap with Dual Weild run ani
summary: Simple swap to fix issue of smacking yourself silly with a bow
descriptionHtml:
Changes the bow run and sprint animations out with the Dual weild sprint animation.  Prevents archers from poking their eyes out.  

The characters now hold the bow out to their left while hauling ass and keep their right hand out to the back for quick access to their quiver.

I played around with swapping Vanilla animations and decided I liked the idea of using the dodge animations so I uploaded another file with just those.

Consider these place holders until an animator makes some nice ones for those of us that like to use archers.

Just swapped some vanilla animations

Install Directions
Just drag and drop the data folder in the zip to your Skyrim directory.

Credits 
Bethsada
author: Bethsada
